name: Buttered Broccoli Cauliflower Carrots
description: This Buttered Broccoli Cauliflower Carrots recipe is a testament to eating well and staying healthy. With its high fiber content, this dish fits perfectly into a diet aiming for health and wellness. The combination of tender broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots, all seasoned and buttered to perfection, makes it a healthy choice for anyone looking to maintain a nutritious diet while indulging in some high-sodium, high-taste goodness.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the broccoli and cauliflower into florets, and peel and slice the carrots.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add 1 teaspoon of salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch the broccoli and cauliflower florets and carrot slices in boiling water for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the vegetables and rinse under cold water to stop the cooking process.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blanched vegetables to the skillet. Season with salt and pepper. Toss well to coat all the vegetables with butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
